text: My dopustim lozh' pred Allakhom, yesli vernemsya k [vere] vashey obshchiny, posle togo kak Allakh izbavil nas ot neye. Ne byvat' tomu, chtoby my vernulis' k vashey vere, yesli tol'ko ne pozhelayet togo Allakh, nash Gospod', kotoryy ob"yemlet Svoim znaniyem vse sushcheye. Na Allakha my upovayem. Gospodi nash! Reshi [spor] mezhdu nami i nashim narodom po istine. Ved' Ty luchshe vsekh reshayesh' [spory]
